name: The Chess School: Play
text: A clean and simple chess service for coaches and academic clubs to pair students for practice games.

name: Stuff Alex Wants
text: A digital parody of a holiday/birthday/whenever wishlist.

name: Barker
text: A site for finding and connecting with other nearby pet owners to facilitate pet play dates.

name: Resume Builder
text: A tool for building targeted resumes based on keyword tags.

name: Make It or Take It
text: Search for recipes or take-out restaurants based on specific ingredients or genres of cuisine.

name: Star Wars Game
text: A game based around some of the lesser-known characters from the original Star Wars trilogy.
